General.Name: Huadian Heavy Industries Co
General.Description: Huadian Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. engages in the design and contracting of EPC projects and equipment manufacturing activities. It is also involved in the material handling engineering, thermal engineering, high-end steel structure engineering, and marine and environmental engineering businesses. The company provides its services in the domestic and foreign electric power, coal, petrochemical, mining, metallurgy, ports, water conservancy, building materials, urban construction, and other fields. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China. Huadian Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Huadian Engineering Co., Ltd.
